name: Fixes for Tumblr Activity
description:
Hey! Do you think tumblr activity is HIDEOUS? WELL we should be friends because I AGREE! So I took it upon myself to cleanse the ugliness of this update in the following ways:
-Chart on activity page hidden
-Follower box hidden
-Note box hidden
-Icon to right of "Activity" on the sidebar hidden
-Removed an arrow that decided to be a hero and refuse to disappear
